name: MLCustomModel
desc: An interface that defines the behavior of a custom model.

items.name: init(modelDescription: MLModelDescription, parameters: [String : Any])
items.desc: Creates a custom model with the given description and parameters.

items.name: func prediction(from: MLFeatureProvider, options: MLPredictionOptions) -> MLFeatureProvider
items.desc: Predicts output values from the given input features.

items.name: func predictions(from: MLBatchProvider, options: MLPredictionOptions) -> MLBatchProvider
items.desc: Predicts output values from the given batch of input features.
